Name: Gansevoort Fizz
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare lemon slice wheel for garnish.
Review: A potent, flavoursome herbal cooler based on aged rum.
History: Created for 5 Ninth in Manhattan and originally published in David Wondrich's 2005 'Killer Cocktails'.
Nutrition: One serving of Gansevoort Fizz contains 266 calories
